name: Bingo Master
description:
Bingo Master

A relaxing game of Bingo. Run a game for the virtual players or use it to play your own real games of Bingo. With a helpful reference to reivew which numbers have been called already, you can be the life of the party as a Bingo master everywhere you go!

This game will be best played on a playdate, but since I don't have one yet, it is currently built to run in your browser.

Controls

Press A to start a game with virtual players, or press B to just call and track numbers.

Spin the mouse wheel to spin the bingo cage. (I recommend scrolling up so your entire browser window doesn't scroll as well)

Up/Down Arrow Keys will scroll the call history.

Press B to go back to the main menu.

Future of this game

I built this game while waiting for the playdate handheld console to open up for pre-order and release the SDK/dev tools. It's very much only a game in the loosest of terms. As for actual gameplay beyond purely a Bingo caller, I do want to add some interactions with the virtual players. I'm experimenting with what kind of interactions would be most fun.
